name: Roo.TabPanel

config.name: listeners

methods.name: getActiveTab
methods.desc: Gets the active {@link Roo.TabPanelItem}.

returns.desc: The active TabPanelItem or null if none are active.

methods.name: beginUpdate
methods.desc: Disables tab resizing while tabs are being added (if {@link #resizeTabs} is false this does nothing)

methods.name: unhideTab
methods.desc: "Unhides" the {@link Roo.TabPanelItem} with the specified id/index.

params.name: id
params.desc: The id or index of the TabPanelItem to unhide.

methods.name: enableTab
methods.desc: Enables a {@link Roo.TabPanelItem} that is disabled.

params.name: id
params.desc: The id or index of the TabPanelItem to enable.

methods.name: setTabWidth
methods.desc: Resizes all the tabs to the passed width

params.name: The
params.desc: new width

methods.name: endUpdate
methods.desc: Stops an update and resizes the tabs (if {@link #resizeTabs} is false this does nothing)

methods.name: addTab
methods.desc: Creates a new {@link Roo.TabPanelItem} by looking for an existing element with the provided id -- if it's not found it creates one.

params.name: id
params.desc: The id of the div to use or create

params.name: text
params.desc: The text for the tab

params.name: content
params.desc: (optional) Content to put in the TabPanelItem body

params.name: closable
params.desc: (optional) True to create a close icon on the tab

methods.name: disableTab
methods.desc: Disables a {@link Roo.TabPanelItem}. It cannot be the active tab, if it is this call is ignored.

params.name: id
params.desc: The id or index of the TabPanelItem to disable.

methods.name: destroy
methods.desc: Destroys this TabPanel

params.name: removeEl
params.desc: (optional) True to remove the element from the DOM as well (defaults to undefined)

methods.name: getTab
methods.desc: Returns the {@link Roo.TabPanelItem} with the specified id/index

params.name: id
params.desc: The id or index of the TabPanelItem to fetch.

methods.name: getCount
methods.desc: Returns the number of tabs in this TabPanel.

methods.name: autoSizeTabs
methods.desc: Manual call to resize the tabs (if {@link #resizeTabs} is false this does nothing)

methods.name: removeTab
methods.desc: Removes a {@link Roo.TabPanelItem}.

params.name: id
params.desc: The id or index of the TabPanelItem to remove.

methods.name: activate
methods.desc: Activates a {@link Roo.TabPanelItem}. The currently active one will be deactivated.

params.name: id
params.desc: The id or index of the TabPanelItem to activate.

methods.name: syncHeight
methods.desc:
Updates the tab body element to fit the height of the container element
for overflow scrolling

params.name: targetHeight
params.desc: (optional) Override the starting height from the elements height

methods.name: addTabItem
methods.desc: Adds an existing {@link Roo.TabPanelItem}.

params.name: item
params.desc: The TabPanelItem to add

methods.name: hideTab
methods.desc: Hides the {@link Roo.TabPanelItem} with the specified id/index

params.name: id
params.desc: The id or index of the TabPanelItem to hide.

methods.name: purgeListeners
methods.desc: Removes all listeners for this object

methods.name: on
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this element (shorthand for addListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options
params.desc: (optional)

methods.name: un
methods.desc: Removes a listener (shorthand for removeListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: addEvents
methods.desc: Used to define events on this Observable

params.name: object
params.desc: The object with the events defined

methods.name: releaseCapture
methods.desc: Removes all added captures from the Observable.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to release

methods.name: removeListener
methods.desc: Removes a listener

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.desc: Fires the specified event with the passed parameters (minus the event name).

params.name: args
params.desc: Variable number of parameters are passed to handlers

returns.desc: returns false if any of the handlers return false otherwise it returns true

methods.name: hasListener
methods.desc: Checks to see if this object has any listeners for a specified event

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The name of the event to check for

returns.desc: True if the event is being listened for, else false

methods.name: capture
methods.desc: Starts capture on the specified Observable. All events will be passed to the supplied function with the event name + standard signature of the event before the event is fired. If the supplied function returns false, the event will not fire.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to capture

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to call

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the fn

methods.name: addListener
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this component

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options

events.name: beforetabchange
events.desc: Fires before the active tab changes, set cancel to true on the "e" parameter to cancel the change

params.name: e
params.desc: Set cancel to true on this object to cancel the tab change

params.name: tab
params.desc: The tab being changed to

events.name: tabchange
events.desc: Fires when the active tab changes

params.name: activePanel
params.desc: The new active tab
